snippet: Government forces and insurgent factions in the Damascus suburbs planned to announce a Russian-brokered deal for a 15-day cease-fire.
abstract: Antigovernment activists in Syria report Russia has negotiated 15-day ceasefire between Syrian military and insurgents in area around Damascus; agreement is seen as sign that Russia is gaining upper hand in negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Government forces and insurgent factions in the Damascus suburbs planned to announce a Russian-brokered deal for a 15-day cease-fire.

headline.main: Syria: Truce Near Damascus Is Planned
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Truce Near Damascus Is Planned
